setupScript.name: openAddDeliveryAddressDialogAndFocusFirstInput
setupScript.description: opens the 'Add Delivery Address' modal dialog, and sets focus on the first input

user: With focus on an input inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.
instructions.raw: With focus on an input inside a modal dialog, close the dialog.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Role of the focused element ('button') is conveyed
Name of the focused element ('Add Delivery Address') is conveyed
